H3.text: when was the last time the seattle seahawks won the superbowl. 2013

A4.text: The 2013 season when they defeated the Denver Broncos to win Super Bowl XLVIII.

A5.text: The Seahawks returned to the playoffs in both 2015 and 2016, but despite winning the Wild Card game in both years they failed to win either Divisional round game on the road.
